title: Initial Launch pressing X button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a game selected (one should be selected by default) and presses the controller's X button
custom_expected: THEN the selected game WILL NOT begin playing

title: Initial Launch pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a game selected (one should be selected by default) and presses the controller's Circle button
custom_expected: THEN the selected game WILL begin playing

title: Pressing X button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND is on the Welcome screen with the 'Get Started' option in focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button

title: Pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND is on the Welcome screen with the 'Get Started' option in focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button
custom_expected: THEN the screen jumps to the 'Create a Free MLB.com' account screen

title: Pressing X button (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND is on the 'Log In' screen from the Welcome screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected: THEN the screen jumps back to the Welcome screen

title: Pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND is on the 'Log In' screen from the Welcome screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button while having the Email field or password field selected
custom_expected:
THEN the alphanumeric virtual keyboard will appear
AND the user may enter their credentials

title: Pressing X button (Close)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND user opens the Menu window
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Close)
custom_expected:
THEN the Main Menu window will close
AND the user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Main Menu window is open
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button while having each item selected

(repeat for each selectable item (EXCEPT Today---this is covered by another case): Home Team, Calendar, Stats & Standings, Settings)
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate sub-menu will appear

title: Today
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND the Game Select screen isn't on Today's date (either on a prior date or future date)
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's Square button
custom_expected:
THEN the Game Select screen will return to the current date.

note: if it is between seasons then the Today date will be set to the last day of post season of the previous season, or if closer to new season then the 1st day of spring training.

title: Home Team pressing Circle
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
Home Team's 'Select Team to Display' window is open
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button while having each item selected

(repeat for each team)
custom_expected:
THEN the appropriate team will become the Home Team
AND the Team Select screen will close
AND user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Home Team pressing X (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Home Team's 'Select Team to Display' window is open
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected:
THEN Team Select screen will close
AND user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Calendar pressing Circle
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND Home Team view is open (with team previously selected)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the MORE button below the game tiles 
AND presses the controller's R3 button to change team to display
AND presses the Circle button while having each item selected

(repeat for each team)
custom_expected:
THEN the Team Select screen will close
AND the appropriate team's calendar will display

title: Calendar pressing X (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND Home Team view is open (with team previously selected)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the MORE button below the game tiles 
AND presses the controller's R3 button to change team to display
AND the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected:
THEN Team Select screen will close
AND user will be returned to the previous screen
AND the calendar will continue to reflect the same team as originally observed before the team picker was opened.

title: Stats & Standings pressing Circle
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND the Stats & Standings modal is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's [ O ] button on either the Standings or Leaderboards option
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate screen (Standings or Leaderboards) will display

title: Stats & Standings pressing X (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND the Stats or Standings screen is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected: THEN the Stats & Standings modal window redisplays

title: Settings pressing Circle
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND the Settings screen is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's [ O ] button
custom_expected: THEN the Show Scores option enables or disables

title: Settings pressing X (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND the Settings screen is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected: THEN the user will be returned to the previous screen
